wikipedia_page.main: Leighton Terence McGivern-Henshaw (born 2 June 1984) is a semi-professional footballer who plays as a striker for Lower Breck. He has Football League experience with Rochdale and Accrington Stanley.

response: Stockport began pre-season with a draw against New Mills, the Hatters' goal coming in the second half scored by trialist Leighton McGivern. Stockport fielded two separate XIs in either half.
* Leighton McGivern – played in the Football League for Rochdale and Accrington Stanley after his first spell at the club.
